value.name: metric+limited companies with value+*type plus right+*structure
homepage: top banner
value.content:
Making Companies Better, Together

WikiRate is an open effort to rate and review company impacts.

Join us   Why WikiRate?

value.name: homepage: wikirate gets it right
value.content:
A collaborative approach to company metrics


Open Data

Easy for anyone to review, contribute, and correct information

Research Re-Use

Metrics structured to be shared, improved and recombined

Fully Sourced

Every Note and Value cites a source you can review

One-Stop

New and old metrics from diverse sources brought together



Learn More
 Watch How WikiRate Works
